  • 1  uberduck_ml_dev.exec.generate_filelist
      • 1.0.1  Supported formats:
      • 1.0.2  standard-multispeaker
      • 1.0.3  vctk

Convert a speech dataset to the standard dataset format.

Usage:

python -m uberduck_ml_dev.exec.generate_filelist \
    --input ~/multispeaker-root \
    --format standard-multispeaker \
    --ouput list.txt

Supported formats:

standard-multispeaker 

root
  speaker1
    list.txt
    wavs
  speaker2
    list.txt
    wavs

vctk

Format of the VCTK dataset as downloaded from the University of Edinburgh.

root
  wav48_silence_trimmed
    p228
      p228_166_mic1.flac
      ...
  txt
    p228
      p228_166.txt
      ...

CACHE_LOCATION.parent.exists()

True

from tempfile import NamedTemporaryFile, TemporaryFile

with NamedTemporaryFile("w") as f:
    _generate_filelist(
        str(Path("/Users/zwf/data/voice/dvc-managed/uberduck-multispeaker/").resolve()),
        "standard-multispeaker",
        f.name,
    )

with TemporaryFile("w") as f:
    _convert_to_multispeaker(
        f,
        str(Path("/Users/zwf/data/voice/dvc-managed/uberduck-multispeaker/").resolve()),
        "standard-multispeaker",
    )
